markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
I will organize workshops on a variety of industry topics to help students better understand their career path. Some of the topics of presentations I'd like to organize would be:

â€¢Â   Connecting Carleton course material to the workplace â€¢Â  Computer Science Research at Carleton â€¢Â  Resume Improvement / Critic type events â€¢Â  Algorithm Interview preparation â€¢Â  System Design Interview preparation

I will also continue to host presentations Iâ€™ve previously organized such as [course selection webinars](https://ccss.carleton.ca/community/news/blog/Course-Selection-Webinar-Slides/) for incoming first years and presentations on[ finding internships](https://ccss.carleton.ca/community/news/blog/Finding-Internships/).
